mapper.select: SELECT c.ID, c.NAME, c.IMG_URL, c.DELETED, c.CREATED_AT, c.UPDATED_AT, ct.ID AS TAG_ID, ct.NAME AS TAG_NAME FROM CAKE c LEFT JOIN CAKE_TAG_MAPPING ctm ON c.ID = ctm.CAKE_ID AND ctm.DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN CAKE_TAG ct ON ct.ID = ctm.TAG_ID AND ct.DELETED = 0 WHERE c.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND c.DELETED = 0 LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAKE WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
